content:
Sure, here are two simple noodle recipes that incorporate nuts and seeds:

1. Peanut Sesame Noodles:
- Cook your preferred noodles according to package instructions and drain.
- In a bowl, whisk together 2 tablespoons of peanut butter, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, 1 tablespoon of rice vinegar, 1 tablespoon of sesame oil, and 1 tablespoon of honey (optional).
- Toss the cooked noodles with the sauce and add sliced bell peppers, chopped scallions, and a handful of peanuts.
- Serve and garnish with sesame seeds.

2. Almond Ginger Noodles:
- Cook your preferred noodles according to package instructions and drain.
- In a pan, sauté sliced garlic and diced ginger in a tablespoon of canola oil until fragrant.
- Add cooked noodles, sliced bell peppers, and sliced carrots to the pan and cook for a few minutes.
- Turn off the heat and add a handful of sliced almonds, a tablespoon of soy sauce, a teaspoon of brown sugar, and a pinch of red pepper flakes.
- Toss everything together and serve with a sprinkle of sesame seeds on top.

Hope you enjoy these recipes!
